text: (Turning away) from the signs and disbelieving in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an (in pride to beguile (men) from the way of Allah) from Allah's religion and obedience. (For him in this world is ignominy) the torment of death and being shackled on the Day of Badr, (and on the Day of Resurrection We make him taste the doom of burning) We make him taste the chastisement of the Fire; and it is said that this means: We make him taste a severe chastisement.
